key.name: put-center-key
key.description: Move window to the center

key.name: put-left-key
key.description: Move window to the left edge

key.name: put-right-key
key.description: Move window to the right edge

key.name: put-top-key
key.description: Move window to the top edge

key.name: put-bottom-key
key.description: Move window to the bottom edge

key.name: put-topleft-key
key.description: Move window to the top left corner

key.name: put-topright-key
key.description: Move window to the top right corner

key.name: put-bottomleft-key
key.description: Move window to the bottom left corner

key.name: put-bottomright-key
key.description: Move window to the bottom right corner

key.name: put-maximize-key
key.description: Maximize window

key.name: put-restore-key
key.description: Restore window to it's original size

key.name: top-left-corner-action
key.description: Action to be performed when window is dropped on the top left corner (0 = None, 1 = Bottom Left Corner, 2 = Bottom Half, 3 = Bottom Right Corner, 4 = Left Half, 5 = Fill Screen, 6 = Right Half, 7 = Top Left Corner, 8 = Top Half, 9 = Top Right Corner, 10 = Maximize)

key.name: top-edge-action
key.description: Action to be performed when window is dropped on the top edge (0 = None, 1 = Bottom Left Corner, 2 = Bottom Half, 3 = Bottom Right Corner, 4 = Left Half, 5 = Fill Screen, 6 = Right Half, 7 = Top Left Corner, 8 = Top Half, 9 = Top Right Corner, 10 = Maximize)

key.name: top-right-corner-action
key.description: Action to be performed when window is dropped on the top right corner (0 = None, 1 = Bottom Left Corner, 2 = Bottom Half, 3 = Bottom Right Corner, 4 = Left Half, 5 = Fill Screen, 6 = Right Half, 7 = Top Left Corner, 8 = Top Half, 9 = Top Right Corner, 10 = Maximize)

key.name: left-edge-action
key.description: Action to be performed when window is dropped on the left edge (0 = None, 1 = Bottom Left Corner, 2 = Bottom Half, 3 = Bottom Right Corner, 4 = Left Half, 5 = Fill Screen, 6 = Right Half, 7 = Top Left Corner, 8 = Top Half, 9 = Top Right Corner, 10 = Maximize)

key.name: right-edge-action
key.description: Action to be performed when window is dropped on the right edge (0 = None, 1 = Bottom Left Corner, 2 = Bottom Half, 3 = Bottom Right Corner, 4 = Left Half, 5 = Fill Screen, 6 = Right Half, 7 = Top Left Corner, 8 = Top Half, 9 = Top Right Corner, 10 = Maximize)

key.name: bottom-left-corner-action
key.description: Action to be performed when window is dropped on the bottom left corner (0 = None, 1 = Bottom Left Corner, 2 = Bottom Half, 3 = Bottom Right Corner, 4 = Left Half, 5 = Fill Screen, 6 = Right Half, 7 = Top Left Corner, 8 = Top Half, 9 = Top Right Corner, 10 = Maximize)

key.name: bottom-edge-action
key.description: Action to be performed when window is dropped on the bottom edge (0 = None, 1 = Bottom Left Corner, 2 = Bottom Half, 3 = Bottom Right Corner, 4 = Left Half, 5 = Fill Screen, 6 = Right Half, 7 = Top Left Corner, 8 = Top Half, 9 = Top Right Corner, 10 = Maximize)

key.name: bottom-right-corner-action
key.description: Action to be performed when window is dropped on the bottom right corner (0 = None, 1 = Bottom Left Corner, 2 = Bottom Half, 3 = Bottom Right Corner, 4 = Left Half, 5 = Fill Screen, 6 = Right Half, 7 = Top Left Corner, 8 = Top Half, 9 = Top Right Corner, 10 = Maximize)

key.name: snapoff-maximized
key.description: Snapoff maximized windows when pulling to edge.

key.name: snapback-windows
key.summary: Snap windows back to original size
key.description: Snaps windows back to their original size if dragged away from their gridded position.

key.name: left-edge-threshold
key.description: Maximum number of pixels from the left edge a window can be dropped (0 - 500)

key.name: right-edge-threshold
key.description: Maximum number of pixels from the right edge a window can be dropped (0 - 500)

key.name: top-edge-threshold
key.description: Maximum number of pixels from the top edge a window can be dropped (0 - 500)

key.name: bottom-edge-threshold
key.description: Maximum number of pixels from the Bottom edge a window can be dropped (0 - 500)

key.name: draw-indicator
key.description: Draw Window Resize Indicator

key.name: outline-color
key.description: Color of the resize indicator outline

key.name: fill-color
key.description: Fill color of the resize indicator

key.name: indicator-direction
key.description: Where the indicator should come from on-screen (0 = From Window, 1 = From Edge)

key.name: indicator-type
key.description: Appearance of the indicator (0 = Outline)

key.name: behind-window
key.description: Draw indicator behind window
